place_name: Dal Lake, Srinagar (Jammu & Kashmir)
timings: Open 24 hours (houseboats & shikara rides usually 6:00 AM – 7:00 PM)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 20 km)
accessibility: Good roads; wheelchair accessible at some ghats; boat rides may not be accessible
guided_tours: Available (shikara owners, tour operators, English/Hindi/Urdu speaking guides)
parking: Available near ghats; charges ₹20–₹50 approx.
nearby_amenities: Houseboats, hotels, restaurants, cafés, markets, restrooms
special_notes: Famous for floating gardens, lotus flowers, Mughal-era houseboats; key hub of Srinagar tourism.

place_name: Gulmarg, Baramulla District (Jammu & Kashmir)
timings: Open all year; Gondola timings 10:00 AM – 5:00 PM
entry_fee: Entry free; Gondola ride Phase 1 ₹740, Phase 2 ₹950 approx.
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 50 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; wheelchair assistance possible in hotels, not on slopes
guided_tours: Skiing & trekking guides available in multiple languages
parking: Public & hotel parking available; charges ₹50–₹100 approx.
nearby_amenities: Ski rentals, resorts, cafes, ATMs, restrooms
special_notes: Known as Meadow of Flowers, one of the world’s highest golf courses, Gondola to Apharwat peak.

place_name: Vaishno Devi Temple, Katra (Reasi District, Jammu & Kashmir)
entry_fee: Free (helicopter ride ₹1730 per person approx. one way)
best_time: March–October (pleasant weather); Navratri festivals are peak season
nearest_railway: Shri Mata Vaishno Devi Katra Railway Station (approx. 2 km to base camp)
nearest_airport: Jammu Airport (approx. 50 km)
accessibility: 13 km trek; ponies, palanquins, battery cars, helicopter service available; not fully wheelchair-friendly
guided_tours: Shrine Board provides assistance; local guides available
parking: Large parking near base camp; free & paid options
nearby_amenities: Hotels, dharamshalas, food courts, medical aid, restrooms
special_notes: One of India’s most visited shrines, dedicated to Goddess Durga; spiritual & trekking destination.

place_name: Sonamarg, Ganderbal District (Jammu & Kashmir)
timings: Open all year (best in summer & snow season)
entry_fee: Free (activities like pony rides, rafting extra)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 100 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; snow may block access in peak winter; not fully wheelchair-friendly
guided_tours: Available for trekking, fishing, river rafting
parking: Roadside parking available; charges ₹30–₹50 approx.
nearby_amenities: Resorts, guest houses, local eateries, tea stalls
special_notes: Known as Meadow of Gold, starting point for Amarnath Yatra & popular trekking routes.

place_name: Pahalgam, Anantnag District (Jammu & Kashmir)
entry_fee: Free (activities like river rafting, horse riding chargeable)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 90 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; trekking trails; not fully wheelchair-friendly
parking: Paid parking available; ₹50–₹100 approx.
nearby_amenities: Resorts, hotels, restaurants, camping gear shops
special_notes: Gateway to Amarnath Yatra; Lidder River, Betaab Valley, and Aru Valley nearby.

place_name: Amarnath Cave Temple, Anantnag District (Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_railway: Anantnag Railway Station (approx. 70 km to base camp)
nearest_bus: Pahalgam Bus Stand (approx. 45 km to base camp)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 90 km)
accessibility: 46 km trek (Pahalgam route) or 14 km trek (Baltal route); ponies, palkis, helicopters available; not wheelchair accessible
guided_tours: Shrine Board arranges facilities; local guides available
parking: Available at base camps (Baltal & Pahalgam); charges not documented
nearby_amenities: Langars (community kitchens), tents, medical camps, shops during Yatra
special_notes: Famous for naturally forming ice Shiva Lingam; highly sacred pilgrimage.

place_name: Shankaracharya Temple, Srinagar (Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 20 km)
accessibility: 243 steps climb; not wheelchair accessible
parking: At temple base; free parking
nearby_amenities: Tea stalls, small shops, restrooms at base
special_notes: Located on Shankaracharya Hill overlooking Dal Lake; dedicated to Lord Shiva; historical and spiritual site.

place_name: Nishat Bagh (Mughal Garden), Srinagar (Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 22 km)
accessibility: Wheelchair accessible on main paths
parking: Available outside garden; ₹20–₹50 approx.
nearby_amenities: Tea stalls, local shops, hotels, restrooms
special_notes: Built by Mughal governor Asif Khan in 1633; known as Garden of Bliss; second largest Mughal Garden in Kashmir.

place_name: Leh Palace, Leh (Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir UT)
nearest_railway: Jammu Tawi Railway Station (approx. 700 km; no direct railway in Leh)
nearest_airport: Kushok Bakula Rimpochee Airport, Leh (approx. 3 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; steep climb; not wheelchair friendly
guided_tours: Guides available; Archaeological Survey of India maintains site
parking: Limited parking nearby; charges not documented
nearby_amenities: Hotels, cafes, shops, monasteries
special_notes: 17th-century palace built by King Sengge Namgyal; resembles Potala Palace (Lhasa).

place_name: Pangong Lake, Leh District (Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir UT)
entry_fee: Inner Line Permit required (~₹400 per person + ₹20 environment fee)
nearest_railway: Jammu Tawi Railway Station (approx. 730 km; no direct rail)
nearest_airport: Kushok Bakula Rimpochee Airport, Leh (approx. 170 km)
accessibility: Accessible via Leh–Manali Highway or Leh–Chang La Pass; roads challenging in winter; not wheelchair-friendly
parking: Available near lake camps; charges vary
nearby_amenities: Camps, tented stays, small eateries
special_notes: Famous for turquoise waters, Bollywood film 3 Idiots; stretches from India to China.

place_name: Betaab Valley, Pahalgam (Anantnag District, Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 95 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; not fully wheelchair-friendly
guided_tours: Local guides available for trekking & sightseeing
parking: Available near valley entrance; ₹50 approx.
nearby_amenities: Small eateries, tea stalls, photography points
special_notes: Named after Bollywood movie Betaab (1983); scenic valley with Lidder River, pine forests.

place_name: Aru Valley, Pahalgam (Anantnag District, Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 100 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; trekking required for interior routes; not wheelchair-friendly
parking: Available at entrance; charges not documented
nearby_amenities: Guest houses, tea stalls, camping areas
special_notes: Base camp for Kolahoi Glacier & Tarsar-Marsar treks; less crowded alternative to Pahalgam.

place_name: Shalimar Bagh (Mughal Garden), Srinagar (Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 25 km)
accessibility: Wheelchair accessible on main pathways
parking: Available outside; ₹20–₹50 approx.
nearby_amenities: Tea stalls, local food shops, restrooms
special_notes: Built by Mughal Emperor Jahangir in 1619; known as Abode of Love; part of UNESCO tentative list of Mughal Gardens.

place_name: Dachigam National Park, Srinagar (Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 35 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; trekking paths inside; not fully wheelchair-friendly
guided_tours: Forest guides available for safaris and trekking
parking: Available at entry; ₹30 approx.
nearby_amenities: Eco-huts, tea stalls, guest houses nearby
special_notes: Known for Hangul (Kashmir stag), Himalayan black bear, and diverse bird species.

place_name: Kargil War Memorial, Dras (Kargil District, Ladakh UT)
nearest_airport: Kushok Bakula Rimpochee Airport, Leh (approx. 160 km)
accessibility: Road accessible via Srinagar–Leh Highway; wheelchair accessible at main memorial site
parking: Large free parking available
nearby_amenities: Tea stalls, small restaurants, army canteen nearby
special_notes: Built in memory of soldiers who sacrificed their lives in 1999 Kargil War; houses gallery, Amar Jawan Jyoti, and war artifacts.

place_name: Hemis Monastery, Leh District (Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir UT)
best_time: June–July (Hemis Festival with mask dances & rituals)
nearest_railway: Jammu Tawi Railway Station (approx. 700 km; no direct railway)
nearest_airport: Kushok Bakula Rimpochee Airport, Leh (approx. 47 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; monastery steps not wheelchair-friendly
parking: Available near monastery; free/nominal charges
nearby_amenities: Guesthouses, tea stalls, souvenir shops
special_notes: One of the largest & richest monasteries in Ladakh; houses ancient thangkas, Buddha statues, and scriptures.

place_name: Zanskar Valley, Kargil District (Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir UT)
timings: Open all year (roads blocked in heavy snow, Nov–May)
best_time: June–September (trekking); January–February (Chadar trek on frozen river)
nearest_airport: Kushok Bakula Rimpochee Airport, Leh (approx. 460 km)
accessibility: Remote valley; challenging roads; not wheelchair-friendly
parking: Available in local villages; not organized
nearby_amenities: Homestays, monasteries, camping sites
special_notes: Famous for Chadar Trek on frozen Zanskar River; monasteries like Karsha & Phugtal nearby.

place_name: Martand Sun Temple, Anantnag District (Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 60 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; uneven ruins not wheelchair-friendly
guided_tours: Available; Archaeological Survey of India maintains site
parking: Available near site; charges not documented
nearby_amenities: Local shops, eateries, restrooms nearby
special_notes: Built by King Lalitaditya in the 8th century; dedicated to Sun God; one of the most important ancient Hindu temples in Kashmir.

place_name: Patnitop, Udhampur District (Jammu & Kashmir)
entry_fee: Free (activities like paragliding, cable car, etc. extra)
nearest_airport: Jammu Airport (approx. 112 km)
accessibility: Road accessible; moderate hill roads; not fully wheelchair-friendly
parking: Roadside & hotel parking available; charges ₹50 approx.
nearby_amenities: Resorts, dhabas, cafes, ATMs, restrooms
special_notes: Known for snow sports, paragliding, and Nathatop viewpoint; part of Jammu region hill stations.

place_name: Kupwara Meadows (Bangus Valley), Kupwara District (Jammu & Kashmir)
nearest_airport: Sheikh Ul-Alam International Airport, Srinagar (approx. 100 km)
accessibility: Remote area; road accessible but limited public transport; not wheelchair-friendly
parking: Available near entry villages; charges not documented
nearby_amenities: Limited guest houses, tea stalls, army camps nearby
special_notes: Known as one of Kashmir’s untouched valleys; famous for meadows, pine forests, and streams.
